mapper.insert: insert into fy_address(address_name, goods_taker, tel,created_user_id, create_time) values (#{addressName}, #{goodsTaker}, #{tel}, #{createdUserId}, #{createTime});

insert into fy_order(order_id, buy_user_id, buy_user_name, sell_item_id, sell_user_id, sell_user_name, create_time,pay_price, address_id) values (#{orderId}, #{buyUserId}, #{buyUserName}, #{sellItemId}, #{sellUserId}, #{sellUserName}, #{createTime}, #{payPrice}, #{addressId})
mapper.select:
select a.order_id, b.sell_id, a.sell_user_id, a.sell_user_name, a.state stateCode, b.sell_title, if(a.pay_type = 0, '货到付款', '在线付款') pay_type, a.pay_price, b.image, a.create_time from fy_order a, fy_sell_publish b where a.sell_item_id = b.sell_id and a.buy_user_id = #{userId} order by a.create_time desc
, ${orderColumn} ${orderType}
